concept.title: 203.104-4 Disclosure, protection, and marking of contractor bid or proposal information and source selection information.

conbody.p: (d)(3) For purposes of FAR 3.104-4(d)(3) only, DoD follows the notification procedures in FAR 27.404-5(a). However, FAR 27.404-5(a)(1) does not apply to DoD.
